name: Finvest
headline: Easy way to buy US Treasury Bills
description: Purchase, manage, and sell US Treasury Bills seamlessly. Get direct access to government-backed treasury bills along with the flexibility of selling anytime.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Finvest.svg)](https://www.getfinvest.com/<index.html>) [ Get the app ](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/open.getfinvest.com/C1TY/website>)
# BREAK BARRIERS
Powerful money tools once reserved for a few, now available to everyone.
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6556fa853342ff062c599933/6573ab5da530220031c7f0b9_--%20\(2\).svg)](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/finvest-invest-in-us-treasury/id6473599514>) [![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/---1.svg)](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bondgrid.bondgrid>)
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/MOBILE-_1_.webp)![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Free-iPhone-15-Pro-Hand-Mockup-Mockuuups-Studio.webp)
## GIVE YOUR MONEY THE SUPERPOWER IT DESERVES
Our mission is to put the power to grow wealth in everyone’s hands. Finvest is your personal wealth manager, available at all times. It helps you optimize your money across spending, saving, and investing to make every dollar work harder for you.Track your finances, invest smartly, and get personalized insights tailored to your portfolio and goals - all in one place.
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/hjj.svg)
#### Take Control
Every investment, every move, every dollar - United in one powerful view that puts you firmly in command. 
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/ZXZ.webp)
#### Stay Ahead Of The Curve
Let our personalized discover feed be your market compass, bringing you curated byte sized news updates tailored to your portfolio
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Discover.webp)
#### Get PersonaliZed Insights
Our personalized insights instantly spot trends, highlight new opportunities, and illuminate blind spots. It's like having a financial genius on speed dial!
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Insights.webp)
#### Invest Smarter
Navigate markets with confidence using intelligent tools that adapt to your investment style and goals
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Invest.webp)
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Invest.webp)
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Insights.webp)
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Discover.webp)
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/ZXZ.webp)
All at one place
## Unified financial Universe
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/ASDSAD.webp)
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/orbit-1.webp)
## YOUR security is our #1 priority
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/5.svg)
Your data stays yours - we never sell or share it with anyone
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/4.svg)
Your identity stays private. Our systems only see the numbers, never who you are
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/3.svg)
Your money deserves bank-grade security, and that's exactly what we deliver
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/6.svg)
We've got your back. We're available to you 24/7
## Have questions? We have answers
Want to know more? You can email us anytime at support@getinvest.com
**Is Finvest the right fit for me?**
If managing your money feels overwhelming or confusing, Finvest is here for you. Whether you’re new to investing or looking to step up your game, we make wealth-building easy and accessible, giving you the tools to take control of your financial future with confidence.
**What makes Finvest different from others?**
Great question! Finvest is your all-in-one financial hub. We combine wealth management, personal finance, and investment insights into one streamlined platform. With Finvest, you can manage, invest, and grow your money in one place—without the hassle of switching between apps. Our standout feature is ‘Discover,’ offering personalized insights tailored to your portfolio and interests. No need to sift through endless news feeds—we use AI to summarize the key points that matter most, helping you stay informed and ahead of the curve without the hassle.
**What types of assets and investments can I manage with this app?**
We support a wide range of assets and investment types. From stocks, ETFs, stock bundles to bonds and T-Bills, so your net worth is as accurate as possible.
**Which brokerages and banks can I connect to the app?**
We support integrations with most brokerages and banks including major ones like Robinhood, Fidelity, Charles Schwab, Wealthfront and more.
**Is Finvest secure?**
Absolutely. Your security is our top priority. We partner with Pershing, a subsidiary of BNY Mellon, one of the world’s largest custodians, to securely hold your assets. Our platform is protected with multi-factor authentication (MFA) and 24/7 system monitoring.
**Okay, this is great, but what’s it going to cost me?**
Finvest's core platform is completely free to use. We are committed to providing accessible financial technology to everyone. For treasury investment, you can view our pricing structure [here](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/bonds.getfinvest.com/support/fee-schedule.html>).
**What if I need help along the way?**
Don’t worry, we’ve got a great support team ready to help. Any questions, any time - just email us at [support@getfinvest.com](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/www.getfinvest.com/support/customer-support#>)
**I’m in! How do I get started with Finvest?**
It’s easy! Just download the app, sign up, and let Finvest guide you on your wealth-building journey. One tap and you’re on your way!
**We are backed by the world’s best investors and investment experts**
![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/paineer.webp)![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/ycomb.webp)![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/UV.webp)![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/Olive-1.webp)
## are you Ready to break barriers?

![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/SS.webp)

[![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/link.svg)](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/getfinvest/about/>) [![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/x.svg)](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/twitter.com/getfinvest>) [![](https://www.getfinvest.com/images/youtube.svg)](https://www.getfinvest.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/channel/UCmlISynptW6n1ylYMEaInvg>)

The above images are for illustrative purposes only and is designed to help visualize the benefits of our services. The interest rates mentioned or implied within these visuals do not necessarily represent current rates, as they are subject to market fluctuations. For the most up-to-date interest rate information, please refer to the Finvest app.‍All investing involves risk. Savings account rates shown as compared by information shown on Titan.com. Finvest is not responsible for the accuracy, timeliness, or completeness of information on third-party websites. Finvest is not a bank and does not offer savings accounts. You should contact your bank for current and complete information about available account types, including applicable interest rates. For other important disclosures, see our disclosures. ​Interest rates are subject to market conditions and returns may vary based on these interest rates. All investments involve the risk of loss and the past performance of a security or a financial product does not guarantee future results or returns. You should consult your legal, tax, or financial advisors before making any financial decisions. Product offerings and availability vary based on jurisdiction.Finvest has an engagement with Atomic Invest, LLC (“Atomic Invest”), an SEC-registered investment adviser, to bring you the opportunity to open an investment advisory account. Investment advisory services are provided by Atomic Invest. Your funds and treasuries are held in custody and cleared through Pershing Advisor Solutions LLC, a subsidiary of the Bank of New York Mellon Corp. Pershing LLC serves as the brokerage firm, a member of FINRA and SIPC. SIPC protects securities customers of its members up to $500,000 (including $250,000 for claims for cash). Explanatory brochure available upon request or at www.sipc.org.

generated_description:
### Finvest: Simplifying Access to U.S. Treasury Bills

**Overview**
Finvest, founded in 2023, is revolutionizing the way investors access U.S. Treasury Bills. As part of the Y Combinator Batch W23, this San Francisco-based startup is driven by a clear mission: to provide an easy pathway for purchasing, managing, and selling government-backed treasury bills.

**What They Do**
Finvest aims to break down financial barriers by equipping everyone with previously exclusive money management tools. Their platform, accessible through [getfinvest.com](https://www.getfinvest.com), is not just limited to treasury bills; it integrates various wealth management capabilities including:
- Optimizing finances across spending, saving, and investing.
- Providing personalized insights and financial tracking—all in one place.
- Ensuring that security and user privacy are paramount; your data is yours and never shared.

**Core Features**
1. **Unified Financial Hub**: Manage stocks, ETFs, bonds, and T-bills seamlessly.
2. **Personalized Insights**: Leverage AI-driven updates tailored to your investment interests and goals, helping you stay ahead of the market without info overload.
3. **Investment Flexibility**: Active management of your portfolio with the ability to sell you treasury bills whenever needed.
4. **Easy Access**: The Finvest app is designed to be user-friendly for both financial veterans and newcomers.

**Security First**
Finvest prioritizes user security, partnering with Pershing, a leading custodian in the financial sector, to safeguard assets. The platform employs multi-factor authentication and is monitored around the clock.

**Cost Structure**
One of the standout features of Finvest is its core platform being completely free to use, promoting accessibility to financial tools for all users. There are transparent pricing structures for treasury investments, which can be found on their website.

**Getting Started**
Interested users can quickly get started by downloading the app, signing up, and embarking on their investment journey with the support of a dedicated team available via email at support@getfinvest.com.

**Conclusion**
Finvest is not just another financial app; it’s a comprehensive tool aimed at democratizing wealth management. Whether you're looking to start investing or needing streamlined management of your assets, Finvest is worth checking out.

### Want to Dive In?
Start your journey towards smarter investing today with Finvest! Visit [getfinvest.com](https://www.getfinvest.com) for more information and to download the app.
